response.summary: Master in Project Management and BSc. in Chemical Engineering. Over eleven (11+) years of experience as Process and Project Engineer, Package Manager and Project Manager developing, supervising and leading Conceptual, Basic, and Detailed Engineering, Procurement & Construction Projects for Oil & Gas industry and Industrial Sector. Wide technical and leadership capabilities, teamwork orientation, administrative knowledge and managerial skills.
response.skills: Process Engineering, P&ID, Aspen HYSYS, Aspen Plus, AutoCAD, Chemical Processing, Project Management, Planning, Entrepreneurship, Entrepreneurship Education, Hydraulic Calculations, International Project Management, Entrepreneurship Development, Artificial Neural Networks, Matlab, Conceptual Engineering, Equipment Sizing, Control Valves, Piping, Process Piping Design

profile_positions.description: Project Manager. Responsible for projects from conceptual design including FEED, detailed design, procurement, fabrication, construction and shipment to site. As integral part of Project Team, accountable for the coordination, performance, monitoring and improvement, handover requirements, budget, schedule, quality and site safety with primary responsibility for projects.
profile_positions.title: Package Manager

profile_positions.description: Project Engineer/Process : Responsbile for engineering design for multiple customer needs. Professional in Management supporting contracts administration and control project dependencies. Project Member Team.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description: Project Member Team. Responsible for process engineering design. Technology evaluations, analysis and simulation of chemical processes, (Aspen HYSYS ®,  Aspen Plus ®, Pipeflow, Pipephase, Excel ®). Application of Value Engineering best practices.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer (Process Engineer)

profile_positions.description: Projects Leader. Responsible for process engineering deliverables and project performance reports.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer and Mechanical Integrity Engineer

company.name: NOV
company.description: NOV delivers technology-driven solutions to empower the global energy industry. For more than 150 years, NOV has pioneered innovations that enable its customers to safely produce abundant energy while minimizing environmental impact. The energy industry depends on NOV’s deep expertise and technology to continually improve oilfield operations and assist in efforts to advance the energy transition towards a more sustainable future. NOV powers the industry that powers the world.
